useful.description: Primary cooking fuel (LPG, wood, dung, kerosene, electricity)
Stove type (open fire, chulah, improved cookstove, LPG stove, electric)
Avg hours per week spent collecting biomass fuel
Location of cooking (indoor separate kitchen, indoor single room, outdoor)
Avg hours per day cooking indoors (all household)
Minutes of moderate+vigorous activity per week
Household experienced flooding in past 5 years
Awareness of air pollution health effects

notes: Features are synthetic templates built to reflect typical household survey variables related to environment, sustainable household practices and health biomarkers. 'source_file' indicates suggested dataset file where variable may be found; verify actual variable names when merging.
